short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Propel is the first Smart-CRM for the PR (Public Relations) industry. This Chrome extension integrates with the Propel App and…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Propel is the first Smart-CRM for the PR (Public Relations) industry. This Chrome extension integrates with the Propel App and allows PR teams to improve their media outreach capabilities, bringing more value to their clients and brands.

The Propel Chrome extension adds the following capabilities to your Gmail account:
- Track pitches sent, including opens and responses
- Send and schedule mail merges for pitching efficiency
- Access your media lists directly from Gmail – no more copy and pasting from spreadsheets
- Easily find sent pitches without the need for labeling

For more information visit us at www.propelmypr.com

* This extension will only work if you are a Propel user.
